JobTitle: Senior Product Designer - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: Job DescriptionVMware Tanzu Labs is hiring a senior product designer. The designer will be a key member of a small product development team building new digital products alongside startups and Fortune 500 companies. This designer will apply user centered design, Lean Product principles, and XP development methodologies while coaching organizations into leading edge design and development practices. Designers in this role rely on human centered design principles to contribute to a huge variety of problem spaces, from data-heavy back-office tools to consumer focused mobile apps to interaction problems in medical devices. VMware Tanzu Labs designers work end to end in the product development process, from research and discovery, to prototyping and solution testing, to visual design and supporting engineers.
